name: What Lies Beyond (Mateus Ikezaki)
description:
"Everything is going to be okay."

As you wake up surrounded by complete darkness, you hear a voice echoing through the suffocating paths of a mysterious cave. It calls to you. With your only recollection being the sensation of falling endlessly, you wonder what lies beyond. 

Controls

A/D - Move

W - Jump (hold for higher jumps)

Right Click - Guide flame

Space - Retrieve flame

Left Click - Grapple to grapple points

Credits

Evan Gao - Programming

Mateus Ikezaki - Art and Programming

Sound effects provided by Freesound
